title: Help I Cannot log in!!!!!!
body: I keep getting this Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server. and cannot login ive tried everything can someone please help me, I was gone on vacation for 2 months come back and its not working plzzzzz help.

replies.body:
I cannot open the guide it just says: This site can’t be reached

support.riotgames.com took too long to respond.

Login issues can be caused by a number of different factors. Most of the time when you see this error at login, it's caused by either Internet Explorer security settings or local network configurations. I recommend taking a look at [our guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) that specifically addresses fixes for this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
